descriptionHtml:
This is a face replacer for Lydia, the follower. I've used my friend Amelia for the face reference because she is sexy xD

Required Mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

author: Indy2000
